main event: An observer sighted a very bright ball of fire that descended near a house in Haslett, Michigan on 15 January 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to be very bright and orange like a traffic light., The observer watched the object descend into a lake near the house., The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds., There was absolutely no sound associated with the object., The object suddenly disappeared completely while being observed.
sighted object: a very bright ball of fire
